node.doctext:
Do not impose this suspension manually. Use chat suspension instead.

To prevent spam, new accounts begin with an "email suspension" which prevents them from chatting in any room, but not from sending messages. They will need to click on the link in their welcome email or visit [Verify your email address]. If the user has issues validating, visit their homenode [Infected Users|to see if they are infected]. If they are, they may be a repeat offender creating a new account.
